thread.title: Origin Energy in trading halt
thread.title_full: Origin Energy in trading halt | Business Spectator

author: Wendy Pugh
title: Origin Energy in trading halt
text:
Origin Energy shares have been placed in a trading halt ahead of an announcement related to a potential capital raising.
The company said in a release to the Australian Securities Exchange that it was requesting the trading halt until it was in a position to make a further statement to the market.
The energy producer and retailer said it expected to be able to make an announcement related to a capital raising outcome before the start of trading on October 6.
Origin reported a loss of $658 million in the 12 months to June 30, against last year's net profit of $530m as the result was hit by writedowns amid weak commodity prices.
